2.name: Dog
2.dialogue: In each region, there are various sections containing questions which you have to go through in order to unlock the next world.

3.name: Cat
3.dialogue: Each section will be on a different topic of SDLC, and as you progress, the questions will increase in difficulty.

4.name: Cat
4.dialogue: Let's not waste any more time! Go ahead and click on the first level!
